references.paper_title: Magic Fixup: Streamlining photo editing by watching dynamic videos
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it directly addresses interactive image editing using video data, a core topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: Stable Video Diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This work is foundational as it provides the Stable Video Diffusion model, which is the base for the proposed FramePainter model.

references.paper_title: Drag your GAN: Interactive point-based manipulation on the generative image manifold
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces DragGAN, a pioneering interactive image editing method which is compared to the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper is highly influential because it details the CLIP model, which is used in the proposed method to measure the semantic similarity between images.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is important as it describes the Stable Diffusion model, which is fundamental to many image generation and editing techniques and directly referenced in this work.
